Articles.Content: but 1810 was special it kept you going to different floors one up than the last one it had teleportation powers

On 2017-6-13 at 8:46 AM, Kosmonaut said:

1793: You open the door, and find yourself on floor 1741. You look around, and realize that this isn't a replica of floor 1741, it is floor 1741. You turn around, and try to walk towards the door, but every step you take towards it, it gets farther away.

92 years later

You eventually reach the door. Finally. You hurry up the stairs, and enter floor 1793 again, only to find yourself in the middle of floor 1741 once more.

7 billion years later

It appears you aren't aging. That's one bonus. Every time you enter the room, you start further and further away from the door. The walk to the door this time has taken 3 million years. Finally, you get out. This time, you decide to skip floor 1793.

After feeling something grating on floor 1811, you decide to head to 1812:

 

1812: You seem to have spawned into a world that has bad "graphics" and is composed of blocks.

continuing on 1812 you hear a voice "hello, my name is jason nice to meet you"

you turn and see this: (suposed to be an egg)

you reply "how are you round?"

1813: UNLUCKYYY

Edited June 18, 2017 by kerbinorbiter

You skip 1813 floor because of a mistake 

Now you are 1814.

There is Russian polar base, covered in 4 meter snow.

1815: The Kerbal Universe is in this room. As you gaze at the system beneath you, you feel very much like a higher power and you proceed to defeat the Deep Space Kraken for the 9.999999999999999999X10^9999th time (or at least, that's what the Kraken told you).

You suddenly realize that your move was irrelevant, as the Kraken will always return.
1816: The kraken isn't really a bad person

Quickly leaving the room before Kraken has a chance.

Room 1816. A painting on a wall: dead Kraken pierced with arrows.

Ninja'd, but not fatally.

Edited June 18, 2017 by kerbiloid

1817: The Kraken gives you cookies and Root Beer because the Kraken is a good person

Edited June 18, 2017 by Kosmonaut

Walking upstairs, we get to 1818.

Here is a bar. We can see: Square Root Beer, Cube Root Beer, Logarithmic Beer and non-alcoholic Linear Beer.
1819: banned for having non-alcoholic beer
Floor 1820: You find out that if no floors had been skipped and each post were a floor like it's supposed to be, this should be floor 1612.
Floor 1821. You realized you missed floor 1812, where an overture was being played.

1822:  A spider the size of a large kitten scuttles across the floor. For reasons best known to itself, it's carrying a human eyeball. It stops and stares at you. In fact, the eyeball appears to be staring at you. With a horrid start, you realize the eyeball looks very like your own! You reach up to your face to confirm that you still have a full complement of eyeballs...and wake up.

There is no sign of spiders, eyeballs or gruesomeness of any other kind...you continue upward.

Edited June 19, 2017 by Xorth Tanovar

Floor 1823: You find yourself in a cool discontinued car traveling back in time to Version 0.25 and find that the next 10 floors will also be in 0.25.

Edited June 19, 2017 by Mrcarrot

once for some reason I was stuck in KSP 0.25 for about a year

Floor 1824: Everyone you have ever known lies dead in front of you

As you know yourself, too, you fall down before really could see anybody else.

You resurrect on floor 1825.
This is KSP hell. You always have 5 m/s less than you need to reach the orbit. And your rovers stick in textures.

Edited June 19, 2017 by kerbiloid

Nope. I'm out.

1826: doot. dooooot. dooooooooooooot. (roughly translates to "Welcome to the 1826th floor of this building. We hope you enjoyed your stay before you go on to the next floor. Bye-bye for the time being!")

1827: it's the hotel from 'The God Complex' from Doctor Who. Let's hope you don't find your room...

Edited June 20, 2017 by Kosmonaut

I don't feel ill, so I pass the doctor's complex and get into 1828.
Here is a small wimdow to watch what happens on 1827.

7 hours ago, kerbiloid said:


Here is a small wimdow to watch what happens on 1827.

You watch people enter hotel rooms with their greatest fears inside, and then slowly get tracked down and killed by an unseen monster

Frightened, you run away upstairs, see "1829", and come into a white room with soft light and mild, nice music.

A courteous and attentive old gentleman, wearing a snow white medical gown, sympathetically asks you:
are you ok? don't you worry about something? maybe you have strange visions? an unseen monster killing people which enter the hotel rooms?

1830: A blue police box materializes in front of you and the REAL doctor gets out... what happens next?

(the eleventh for canon purposes)

Edited June 20, 2017 by Kosmonaut

Doctor gets smashed into concrete wall. The blue police box was turned wrong side.

1831. The blue police box.
Floor 1832: You open up to a room where there is a copy of you only as the opposite gender. Your Gender Opposite self decides to tag along with you.
